title: September (simplified)
lyrics:
[intro]
(D) (Amaj7) x3
(GM7)
 
Do you re(D)member
The (Amaj7)21st  night of Sep(D)tember?
Love was (Amaj7)changing the minds of pre(D)tenders
While (Amaj7)chasing the clouds a(Gmaj7)way
 
Our hearts were (D)ringing
In the (Amaj7)key that our souls were (D)singing
As we (Amaj7)danced in the night, remem(D)ber
How the (Amaj7)stars stole the night a(Gmaj7)way (Gmaj7) (ha - ha - ha)
 
[chorus]
(Bm7)Ba de (E7)ya - (A)say do you re(F#m)member
(Bm7)Ba de (E7)ya - (A)dancing in Sep(F#m)tember
(Bm7)Ba de (E7)ya - (A)never was a (F#m)cloudy (G)day (G)
 
(Bm7)Ba de ya (E7)Ba de ya (A) Ba de ya (F#m)Ba de ya
(Bm7)Ba de ya (E7)Ba de ya (A) Ba de ya (F#m)Ba de ya
(Bm7)Ba de ya (E7)Ba de ya (A) Ba de ya(F#m)aaa  de yaa(G)aa (G-G-G)
 
My thoughts are (D)with you 
Holding (Amaj7)hands with your heart to (D)see you
Only (Amaj7)blue talk and love, remem(D)ber
How we (Amaj7)knew love was here to (Gmaj7)stay
 
Now De(D)cember
Found the (Amaj7)love that we shared in Septem(D)ber
Only (Amaj7)blue talk and love, remem(D)ber
The (Amaj7)true love we share to(Gmaj7)day (Gmaj7) (ha - ha - ha)
 
[chorus]
(Bm7)Ba de (E7)ya - (A)say do you re(F#m)member
(Bm7)Ba de (E7)ya - (A)dancing in Sep(F#m)tember
(Bm7)Ba de (E7)ya - (A)never was a (F#m)cloudy (G)day (G)
 
(Bm7)Ba de (E7)ya - (A)say do you re(F#m)member
(Bm7)Ba de (E7)ya - (A)dancing in Sep(F#m)tember
(Bm7)Ba de (E7)ya - (A)golden dreams were (F#m)shiny (G)days (G)
 
(Bm7)Ba de ya (E7)Ba de ya (A) Ba de ya (F#m)Ba de ya
(Bm7)Ba de ya (E7)Ba de ya (A) Ba de ya (F#m)Ba de ya
(Bm7)Ba de ya (E7)Ba de ya (A) Ba de ya(F#m)aaa  de yaa(G)aa (G-G-G) [end]
